tool.name: demo3D08
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D08 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and vesicular channels from all vesicular object models (nucleoli, lysosomes, endosomes, and mitochondria) with sampling method set to render vesicular objects as ellipsoids; without convolution. This model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset, which is included in CellOrganizer.
-----
**Inputs**
- Seed for the pseudo-random number generator - Image compression algorithm
-----
**Output**
- A zip file with six TIFF (.tif) files for the nuclear, cell shape, lysosomal, nucleolar, endosomal, and mitochondrial channels
